title: Hidden Hints

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
- This card is **Hidden**.
 - Upon playing this card, you gain knowledge of 2 colors from the hands of everyone in a list without anyone's names. You may then choose to add 1 of those colors to your hand.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:colorless:1106434944261177374> + <:orange:1106716206905438231> ):
fields.value:
- This card is **Hidden**.
 - Upon playing this card, gain a list of __all colors__ that exist from the hands of everyone. You may then choose to add 1 of those colors to __all cards__ in your hand.

desc:
Post 2295
- You do not know that this card is **Flippable**.
